summary.span: 通过配置对终结点启用 。

span.span: Enables the for an endpoint through configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个 子类型，该子类型可用于通过配置将 包括在终结点上。The is a subtype that can be used to include the on an endpoint through configuration. 此元素没有可配置的属性。There are no configurable properties on this element. 如果使用 对终结点进行了配置，则 允许 ASP.NET AJAX 网页访问该终结点。The , in turn, allows an endpoint to be accessed by ASP.NET AJAX Web pages when it is configured with the . 有关如何使 WCF 服务能够响应 ASP.NET AJAX 客户端的详细信息，请参阅为[ASP.NET Ajax 创建 WCF 服务](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/creating-wcf-services-for-aspnet-ajax)。For more information about how to enable a WCF service to respond to ASP.NET AJAX clients, see [Creating WCF Services for ASP.NET AJAX](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/creating-wcf-services-for-aspnet-ajax). ## Examples 下面是一个示例，该示例使用此配置元素来配置 ASP.NET AJAX 网页要访问的 WCF 终结点。The following is an example of using this configuration element to configure a WCF endpoint to be accessed by ASP.NET AJAX Web page. ``` ```
